TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 16
TEI.2.document_title: John Blanchard and George Lauman to Moses Austin, 03-16-1795

barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This and the next two documents are undated. They are inserted here because they bear on the contract preceding.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 16

div1.p: Dr. Messrs John D Blanchard and George Lauman in A/Ct with Moses Austin
March 16 To 120,000 Acres of Land in Virginia as pr Contract of this Date six pence money of Pennsylvania pr Acre. 8, 000
March 16 By Cash receiv'd from you to purchase 50 Thousand Acres of Land Warrants @ 20 Drs________________________1,000
" By Geo Laumans Note for G00 Dollars____ 600
" By Jno D Blanchards receipt For 6,100 Dollars to the Credit of S Austin & Co____________________6,400
